name: Out of Space!
description:
You are the Great Commander of alien space army. One victory separates you from defeating planet Earth, however, miserable people sent an unmanned ship with a bomb on board in the center of your space army. Do not let it crash, otherwise your whole army will be destroyed in one second! You are able to point a direction to your ships, but little kamikaze-like ship is approaching... Сan you take control of the situation?

To beat the game you need to earn enough points and defeat the boss. Good luck!

#gmtkgamejam2020 #gmtkjam #gamejam #outofcontrol #outofspace
